channel.title: CVE Feed for Sony Video & Sound Products Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2018-0690|2024-08-05T03:35:49.095Z -- sony%20video%20%26%20sound%20products%20inc. -- music%20center%20for%20pc
item.description: An unvalidated software update vulnerability in Music Center for PC version 1.0.02 and earlier could allow a man-in-the-middle attacker to tamper with an update file and inject executable files.
